Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.security.auth

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICatalysPermission
    Simple marker interface to allow us to easily identify our own permissions.
    IUserManager
    This defines an object which supports user login and user permissions based on action strings.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectionPointPrincipal
    Principal representing a FIX connection point.
    JaasUserManager
    Implementation of IUserManager based on the Java Authentication and Authorization Service (JAAS) - see http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.1/docs/guide/security/jaas/JAASRefGuide.html.
    JaasUtils
    Some utility methods related to JAAS.
    ParameterizedCallbackHandler
    A CallbackHandler that just returns the supplied name and password.
    SimpleGroupPrincipal
    Represents a group (of users).
    SimplePermission
    Simple permission with precisely the characteristics of BasicPermission which it subclasses.
    SimplePrincipalBase
    Base class for our Principal's.
    SimpleUserPrincipal
    Represents a user.
    UserManagerRegistry
    Singleton which holds the current IUserManager object, if any.
    UserPassLoginModule
    Simple username and password login module.
    XmlLoginModule
    This LoginModule authenticates users with a password taken from an XML file specifying users and their groups.
